110.question: what amounts of size were used on german-english?

3-Table1-1.png: For German-English (DE→EN), the training corpus size was 159,000 sentences and the subword vocabulary size was 3,220,000 words.</s>
For the German-English (DE→EN) subset of the IWSLT14 data, the training corpus size was 159,000 sentences and the subword vocabulary size was 3,220,000 words.</s>

110.answer: Training data with 159000, 80000, 40000, 20000, 10000 and 5000 sentences, and 7584 sentences for development
